Sql.query: insert into ind_stkcombustible_detalle( stkdetcodi, stkcmtcodi, stkdettipo, d1, d2, d3, d4, d5, d6, d7, d8, d9, d10, d11, d12, d13, d14, d15, d16, d17, d18, d19, d20, d21, d22, d23, d24, d25, d26, d27, d28, d29, d30, d31, stkdetusucreacion, stkdetfeccreacion, stkdetusumodificacion, stkdetfecmodificacion ) values( :stkdetcodi, :stkcmtcodi, :stkdettipo, :d1, :d2, :d3, :d4, :d5, :d6, :d7, :d8, :d9, :d10, :d11, :d12, :d13, :d14, :d15, :d16, :d17, :d18, :d19, :d20, :d21, :d22, :d23, :d24, :d25, :d26, :d27, :d28, :d29, :d30, :d31, :stkdetusucreacion, :stkdetfeccreacion, :stkdetusumodificacion, :stkdetfecmodificacion )
update ind_stkcombustible_detalle set {0} stkdetusumodificacion = :stkdetusumodificacion, stkdetfecmodificacion = :stkdetfecmodificacion where stkdetcodi = :stkdetcodi
select * from ind_stkcombustible_detalle where stkcmtcodi = {0} and stkdettipo in ({1})

select stkcmt.stkcmtcodi, stkcmt.ipericodi, stkcmt.emprcodi, stkcmt.equicodicentral, stkcmt.equicodiunidad, stkcmt.tipoinfocodi, empr.emprnomb, eqpcentral.equinomb as equinombcentral, eqpunidad.equinomb as equinombunidad, tipoinfo.tipoinfodesc, stkdet.* from ind_stock_combustible stkcmt left outer join si_empresa empr on empr.emprcodi = stkcmt.emprcodi left outer join eq_equipo eqpcentral on eqpcentral.equicodi = stkcmt.equicodicentral left outer join eq_equipo eqpunidad on eqpunidad.equicodi = stkcmt.equicodiunidad left outer join si_tipoinformacion tipoinfo on tipoinfo.tipoinfocodi = stkcmt.tipoinfocodi inner join ind_stkcombustible_detalle stkdet on stkdet.stkcmtcodi = stkcmt.stkcmtcodi where stkcmt.ipericodi = {0} and ('{1}' = '-1' OR stkcmt.emprcodi in ({1})) and stkdettipo in ({2}) order by empr.emprnomb, eqpcentral.equinomb, eqpunidad.equinomb, tipoinfo.tipoinfodesc
